author: smuzaffar
body:
This change should fix the warning [a]. `aRmsThr` is needed only in the code which has been commented out, so the PR proposes to move it in the comment too


[a] https://cmssdt.cern.ch/SDT/cgi-bin/buildlogs/el8_amd64_gcc12/CMSSW_14_1_ROOT6_X_2024-07-16-2300/DQM/EcalMonitorClient
```
src/DQM/EcalMonitorClient/src/LedClient.cc: In member function 'virtual void ecaldqm::LedClient::producePlots(ecaldqm::DQWorkerClient::ProcessType)':
  src/DQM/EcalMonitorClient/src/LedClient.cc:166:15: warning: unused variable 'aRmsThr' [-Wunused-variable]
   166 |         float aRmsThr(sqrt(pow(aMean * toleranceAmpRMSRatio_, 2) + pow(3., 2)));

```
title: [DQM] Fix Warning: move the unused code in the comment where it is needed
